Rulings.Cat:
● 'Destiny End Dragoon' can't be Special Summoned from the GY if it was not successfully Fusion Summoned before being sent to the GY. For example, if 'Destiny End Dragoon' is randomly sent to the GY by 'Success Probability 0%', it can't be Special Summoned from the GY.
● The damage inflicted with 'Destiny End Dragoon's' effect is equal to the current ATK of the destroyed monster on the field. If you destroy a face-down monster, 0 damage is inflicted.
Rulings.TeleDAD:

● The damage inflicted with 'Destiny End Dragoon's' effect is equal to the current ATK of the destroyed monster on the field. If you destroy a face-down monster, 0 damage is inflicted.

● The damage inflicted with 'Destiny End Dragoon's' effect is equal to the current ATK of the destroyed monster on the field. If you destroy a face-down monster, 0 damage is inflicted.

Rulings.Base: 1. "Destiny End Dragoon" cannot be Special Summoned from the GY if it was not successfully Fusion Summoned before being sent to the GY. For example, if "Destiny End Dragoon" is randomly sent to the GY by "Success Probability 0%", it cannot be Special Summoned from the GY.\n2. The damage inflicted with the effect of "Destiny End Dragoon" is equal to the current ATK of the destroyed monster on the field. If you destroy a face-down monster, 0 damage is inflicted.

PSCT.Vegas:
Destiny HERO - Plasma" + "Destiny HERO - Dogma"
Ⓢ If Fusion Summoning this card, Fusion Substitute monsters can't be used.
① Once per turn: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; 
destroy that target, and if it was face-up, your opponent takes damage equal to its ATK on the field. 
(You can't conduct your Battle Phase the turn you activate this effect). 
② During your Standby Phase, if this card is in your GY: 
You can banish 1 "Destiny HERO" card from your GY; Special Summon this card.

destroy that target, and if it was face-up, your opponent takes damage equal to its ATK on the field.
